data.title: Boxing Legends Of The Ring - In-Box - Sega Genesis
data.meta_description: The set of punches in the game is pretty much standard, jab, hook, uppercut, even the ever popular but illegal low blow. Also, for each round and every knockdown you score on an opponent, you get a super punch, a straight shot to the face and is almost unstoppable and connected right could knock out your opponent, but
data.text:
Fair Game Warranty & Return Policy

All systems/accessories purchased through FairGame.shop are guaranteed to be free from defects which affect function/playability (unless otherwise noted) and are covered by a 60 day warranty. Games are covered by a 14 day warranty. New unopened products may be returned for a full refund of the purchase price, not including shipping, within 60 days. Pre-owned and opened new products may be returned for a refund of the purchase price, not including shipping, within 14 days of receiving it.

If you need to return an item, just email us or give us a call and we will help you resolve any issue.
